news.title: Laptop Mag is shutting down
news.summary: Laptop Mag is shutting down after nearly 35 years of providing consumers with in-depth information about laptops and other technology. In a staff meeting seen by The Verge, Faisal Alani said, “After careful consideration and a review of our long-term strategy, we’ve made the decision’

news.title: Nothing Headphone 1 review: head-turning
news.summary: Nothing's first pair of over-the-ear headphones has arrived, bearing the company's signature retro-transparent design. With the $299 Nothing Headphone 1, you have to commit to having that aesthetic wrapped around your ears.

news.title: Nothing’s over-ear headphones are all about the buttons
news.summary: Nothing has launched its first pair of over-ear headphones, imaginatively named the Headphone 1. At $299, these are priced to compete with flagship fare, distinguished by their distinctive Nothing design language.

news.title: Nothing’s ‘first true flagship’ phone plays it a little safe
news.summary: The Nothing Phone 3 lets you play Spin the Bottle on the back of the phone. “The Glyph interface is not a gimmick,” Nothing founder and CEO Carl Pei says.

news.title: Here are the best AirPods deals you can get right now
news.summary: If you know where to look, you can often score discounts on Apple’s ever-expanding AirPods lineup. Both the newer AirPod Max and Airpods 4 (with and without ANC) now consistently receive discounts.
